extTitle.description: Expand the title in the browser address bar

extDescription.message: Used to take over the download function that comes with the browser, eliminating the trouble of opening the download page to view the downloaded file.

openFile.description: Open file in the right-click menu

openFileFolder.description: The directory where the file is opened in the right-click menu

copyFilename.description: Copy file name in the right-click menu

copyDownloadUrl.description: Copy download address in the right-click menu

deleteFile.description: Delete file in the right-click menu

search.description: The prompt text of the search box

openDownloadFolder.description: Prompt text to open the download directory

downloadFolder.description: The text of the button to open the download directory

clearAllHistory.description: Clear the prompt text of the download history

empty.description: Prompt text when there is no download record

cancelDownload.description: Prompt text for cancel download button

safetyWaring.description: Warning title of file security prompt

downloadStart.description: The prompt content when the download starts

downloadComplete.description: The prompt content when the download is complete

open.description: Open button in the download completion prompt

openFolder.description: Open catalog button in the download completion prompt

fileDanger.message: The downloaded file may harm your computer

urlDanger.message: The file downloaded from this URL may harm your computer

contentDanger.message: The downloaded file is a malicious file

uncommonDanger.message: The file at this URL is not recommended to download, it may be dangerous

hostDanger.message: The download comes from a host that is known to publish malware, which may be risky

unwantedDanger.message: The download item may not be required or safe, for example it may change the browser or computer settings

safeDanger.message: The download has no risk to the user's computer

total.description: The prompt text of the total size of the downloaded file

deleteHistory.description: Prompt text for deleting the record button during file download

pauseDownload.description: Prompt text for pause download button

accept.description: Keep file button in danger notification

saveFile.description: Reserved file reminder in danger reminder

options.description: Download the title of the management configuration page

iconAuto.description: Select the icon according to the browser color mode

downloadSound.description: A tone will sound after the download is complete

soundOn.description: Turn on and make a sound after downloading is complete

soundOff.description: Turn off a beep when the download is complete

downloadNotice.description: Send a notification to remind users when downloading

startNotice.description: Send a notification to remind users when downloading

completeNotice.description: Send a notification to remind users when downloading

dangerNotice.description: Send a notification to remind users when downloading
